title: Heraldic kiteshield (Construction)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A heraldic kiteshield is a decorative steel, adamant or rune kiteshield. Players can paint them on a shield easel or banner easel in a player-owned house if they have level 43 Crafting or higher and have been assigned a crest by Sir Renitee in the White Knights' Castle. Sir Renitee will not assign a crest unless the player has over level 16 Construction. A player's first crest assignment is free, and it costs 5,000 coins to change your crest to another one, however some crests have other requirements, detailed below. Players can use a shield easel in another players house if they do not have one in theirs. The shields have exactly the same stats as their steel, adamant or rune counterparts.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Heraldic kiteshield (Construction)
Not to be confused with Rune heraldic armour.

A heraldic kiteshield is a decorative steel, adamant or rune kiteshield. Players can paint them on a shield easel or banner easel in a player-owned house if they have level 43 Crafting or higher and have been assigned a crest by Sir Renitee in the White Knights' Castle. Sir Renitee will not assign a crest unless the player has over level 16 Construction. A player's first crest assignment is free, and it costs 5,000 coins to change your crest to another one, however some crests have other requirements, detailed below. Players can use a shield easel in another players house if they do not have one in theirs. The shields have exactly the same stats as their steel, adamant or rune counterparts.

If a player is killed by another player, the shield will convert into a steel/adamant/rune kiteshield if it is not protected upon death, depending on the shield the player used to make the heraldic kiteshield.

Note: As of an update, the Saradomin and Zamorak heraldic shields will offer protection in the God Wars Dungeon.

Crest Name Requirements Steel Adamant Rune
Arrav Shield of Arrav Arrav Arrav Arrav
Asgarnia None Asgarnia Asgarnia Asgarnia
Dorgeshuun The Lost Tribe Dorgeshuun Dorgeshuun Dorgeshuun
Dragon Dragon Slayer I Dragon Dragon Dragon
Fairy Lost City Fairy Fairy Fairy
Guthix 70+ Prayer Guthix Guthix Guthix
H.A.M. None HAM HAM HAM
Horse Toy horsey in inventory Horse Horse Horse
Jogre None Jogre Jogre Jogre
Kandarin None Kandarin Kandarin Kandarin
Misthalin None Misthalin Misthalin Misthalin
Money Costs 500,000 coins Money Money Money
Saradomin 70+ Prayer Saradomin Saradomin Saradomin
Skull Skulled Skull Skull Skull
Varrock None Varrock Varrock Varrock
Zamorak 70+ Prayer Zamorak Zamorak Zamorak

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine information of the Horse heraldic kiteshield is in reference to a running gag in RuneScape in which horses are said not to exist.
  • Many PvP clans designate a heraldic shield to be worn during wars.
